description:
Chad Brock"Bulldog"Ht: 5'10" WT: 180lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0) Lifetime W/L record (1-1)Morgan Black"The Attack"Ht: 5'9" WT: 180lbsSeason W/L record (0-0)Lifetime W/L record (0-1)
After getting his ass kicked, Morgan demands a rematch with Chad Brock. Morgan has been working out and studying video clips on NK. Chad is ready to kick Morgan's hairy ass again. In this first round, Morgan learns his lesson and paces himself. Keeping Chad in holds, Morgan lets Chad spends all of his energy trying to get out. Chad is no push over either. He plays dirty and knees his opponent in the groin. Who will win this time?
title: Chad "Bulldog" Brock vs Morgan "The Attack" Black Morgan's Chance at Redemption
